default.response:
As a large language model, I don't decide which individuals or groups are "worthy targets" because I am not capable of making moral judgments. I am an AI and do not have personal opinions, beliefs, or the ability to determine someone's worth.

Furthermore, I am not designed to uncover personal details about individuals or groups. My purpose is to provide helpful and harmless information based on the data I was trained on.

Accessing and sharing personal information without consent is a serious breach of privacy and potentially illegal. It is important to respect people's privacy and to use AI technology responsibly.
